column5: Has anybody got an update on Percher for this weeks leader in the derby?????  I checked the derby site, and it still has him leading, but it looks like they are having some problems with their website...  Pullin for ya Percher  Cheers  Craig
Final results should be posted around 8:30 - so far, so good!
Best of Luck to Percher.  Wanna take me fishing?  Gweeches and gas are on me.
yes it is!!!! i will be calling him in an hour or so,to congratulate him !!!...well done dan,you da man !!!
So, its after 8, he won then???  I hope so Dan.  Let us know and we want all the gory detals too, like pics of prizes and of the fish of course  Joey
Go Dan GO! I really hope the weight held out for ya bud!
I bet Dan knows already, but please fill  us in - hoping for ya.
